feature.name: camel-optaplanner
feature.details: The camel-optaplanner feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package com.sun.tools.xjc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-pgevent
feature.details: installing camel-pgevent may output an error in the log but it is installed correctly

feature.name: camel-spark-rest
feature.details: camel-spark-rest is deprecated in OSGi, use camel-servlet or camel-jetty instead. This feature requires sun.reflect package, you'll need to add it to your container. In Karaf you can do this by adding sun.reflect in the JDK8 section of etc/jre.properties file

feature.name: camel-spring-redis
feature.details: Does not work with in OSGi actually
